Notes

On back: ©&℗ 2018 Deafheaven, under exclusive license to Anti, Inc. In gatefold sleeve: recorded live to tape at 25th street recording in oakland, ca in february 2018 [...] spoken word on "you without end" read by nadia kury, taken from excerpts of the short story "black and borax" by tom mcelravey On sticker: 180 Grams Colored Vinyl Pressing plant uncredited, derived from runout etchings. Clear pink vinyl housed in a gatefold sleeve with black polylined inner sleeves.
